extendedInfo.description: Camera Ghost Detector is a new paranormal activity radar with camera ghost vision.It is the very first ghost detector to use the camera on Android.The ghost around you will be displayed on the camera area.When the app detect a ghost move your smartphone slowly until you see it between the lines on the radar, then you will see the ghost's representation on your screen.Be careful the ghosts could be good but also evil.Enjoy scaring your family and friends too.And remember this is for entertainment purposes!

reviews.title: Sucks!
reviews.comment: If you time it, the app says that there is an \"EVIL GHOST PRESENT\" No matter where you are or where you point it. This sucks! Uninstalled

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: This app very good. It is make me scared. I satisfaction with it.

reviews.title: So far so good.

reviews.comment: The ghosts are not real. But otherwise, it is good for entertainment purposes only.

reviews.comment: This is completely fake all the ghost says is im s bad boy lol I dont think an Arabic ghost would have an American accent lol but worh it for young kids for Halloween

reviews.title: Spooky but  fun
reviews.comment: I scanned  in my room and it said evil goast detected but when I  tried to follow it  it ran away . The next day I scanned inside my living room  and it said evil goast detected but this time it  was right infrunt of me and it said some kind of evil spell world and then my tv trned off

reviews.title: Great apps!
reviews.comment: everytime i use this apps,i turn off first the sound coz it\'s really scary,everytime the scanner moves to scan the ghost i\'m really scared for it might be a good or a evil ghost,the scanner sometimes detect the good ghost and sometimes it\'s evil! This is great for halloween party! More power guys! ;-)
